Debian can has new DD now!

18 Apr 2008
After more than 4 months, the task of creating accounts for new debian developers has been delegated to someone who has more time. He finished the task quickly, meaning that there are now _a lot_ more Debian Developers.

I'm glad to read that. The blogs on Planet Debian reflect the same relief from Debian people.
